page.title: 15Totternhoe bus service
page.content: Totternhoe is served by the No. 61 bus service of the United Counties Bus Company. This particular route runs from Luton bus station, through Dunstable,Totternhoe, Eaton Bray and on to Eddlesborough. Some buses terminate there, others travel on to Aylesbury bus station. The buses are green in colour. There are at present seven buses each way through the village each week day and on Saturdays. There are also a few buses on Sunday. In the past, there were more buses than this coming through the village, but in common with other rural areas, the number of buses has been declining. There are special schools' buses which collect children from the villages and take them the school in Dunstable, bringing them home at night. These are also run by United Counties.
